meanings.sent1: The disliker refused to eat the broccoli.
meanings.sent2: My sister is a disliker of horror movies.
meanings.sent3: The disliker of rainy days always carries an umbrella.
meanings.sent4: She was a disliker of change, clinging to familiarity like a lifeline.
meanings.sent5: The disliker's face twisted in disgust at the sight of the slimy snail.

meanings.definition: To have a feeling of dislike towards something.
meanings.sent1: I disliker the taste of mushrooms.
meanings.sent2: He dislikers Mondays more than any other day of the week.
meanings.sent3: The cat dislikers baths so much that it hides under the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her heart dislikered the idea of leaving her hometown for good.
meanings.sent5: The child's face dislikered as he bit into the bitter lemon.
